roleset.name: fight (with)
roleset.note: BATTLE-V NOTES: Frames file for 'battle' based on survey of sentences in financial subcorpus. Verbnet entries battle-36.4-1, meet-36.3-2. (from battle.01-v)
BATTLE-N NOTES: Roleset based on verb entry battle.01, OntoNotes grouping battle-n senses 1, 2, 3; Maps to VN classes battle-36.4-1 and meet-36.3-2. Framed by Claire. (from battle.01-n)

role.descr: fight or other combatant, if separate

example.name: basic transitive
example.text: At Kidder, a unit of General Electric Co., and other big brokerage firms, stockbrokers battle their own firm's program traders a few floors away.
example.arg: At Kidder, a unit of General Electric Co., and other big brokerage firms
their own firm 's program traders a few floors away

example.name: all args
example.text: Its 6,500 workers, who [*T*] had battled Tiger's management for years over givebacks, were union members until the day of the merger, when most of their unions were automatically decertified.

example.name: merged combatants
example.text: That's the view of some analysts here who argue that Britain's leading maker of luxury cars still may have two U.S. auto giants battling for it.

example.name: NP only, all arguments
example.text: its battle with General Motors Corp. over Jaguar PLC

example.name: Args 0 & 1
example.text: She finally lost her battle against breast cancer.

example.name: Arg 0, battlers in one mention
example.text: That game show is a battle of wits.

example.name: All arguments
example.text: Mueller believes Richards edited a version of her e-mails to bolster her custody battle with Sheen.
